data.text: @bkadeg @HCS_GovNL I should add it is per capita and not raw numbers

@bkadeg @HCS_GovNL i am from NL and have been following covid there. Surprised to see the # & deaths increasing. This past week NL has the 3rd highest caseload in all of Canada, even higher than the USA https://t.co/jH61BK0o0w.

@HCS_GovNL The average age of our covid-19 deaths is 70 years old. This age group has been over 90% fully vaccinated since Sept 27th.. the beginning of Delta. According to Furey this age group is now 98% fully vaccinated. I suspect they are also boosted & it's been like this for months. https://t.co/e7J9EP46Pm

@beth_loves_meth @abambury @HCS_GovNL I showed you a study which directly shows how cloth masks aren't effective and another talking about development. Saying, "their development has been affected for years anyway" isn't an argument.

@beth_loves_meth @abambury @HCS_GovNL The masks aren't effective against omicron. What don't you understand about that? It's in all the schools - classes are basically empty due to isolation and this is WITH masks all day with only 15 minutes for our children.

@realtdavid @abambury @HCS_GovNL kidsâ€™ learning and mental dev have been negatively impacted for years now and this is more rooted in the school system itself rather than the covid restrictions. i would rather my kids wear a mask than risk spreading a virus to my immunocompromised family.
